website_summaries.verdict: This remover will get tough calluses quickly but should be used with caution since a cut could result from the blade.
pros: Slices away calluses with its wide blade
It also includes a rasp for smoothing skin
It can be used on wet or dry skin, and replacement blades are available
cons: Users need to be careful since this does use an actual blade that could cut their feet
Diabetics should be especially careful about using this device for the same reason

customer_reviews.title: Who even knew this genius tool existed?!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I didn’t even know something like this existed. If you are doing a lot of grip work while exercising (kettlebells, barbells, pull-ups, ring work, etc.), you’ll need something like this to help w callus build up. I use it weekly to shave off unwanted skin. It doesn’t hurt and is easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: LauraHop

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: My kids and husband have always teased me because my heels were basically rocks. Not anymore! This worked so well! It took me a while to get them done because I was being really careful but the difference is incredible! My feet feel so different when I walk. I can actually FEEL the rugs in the house. I'm so glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Cut the hell outta me
customer_reviews.text: Sorry not a fan. First time I tried to use it cut me pretty bad. Never used it again.
customer_reviews.author: Draggon

customer_reviews.title: Don't work well
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing really wrong with these but they don't have enough room after the razor so they didn't really work in my calluses.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Zanolini

customer_reviews.title: Maintain your Crossfit calluses!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to maintain my calluses from crossfit, it does a great job! Exactly what I was looking for! Watch the video on their site for explanation on use as the instructions are horrible. Not a big deal but the one I received was pink instead of white like the picture shows.
customer_reviews.author: Brads07

customer_reviews.title: Such a clever little shaver.
customer_reviews.text: Callus shaver trims calluses painlessly and generally stops cutting when the callus is gone. You can scrape non-callused skin with this tool, but you have to really work at it. The rasp is interesting, but must be for larger callused areas (the heel for example); I have toe calluses and this takes a smooth surface slice with each pull stroke. Note that there is a white plastic guard below the blade; remove it of it won't cut anything. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sperrier

customer_reviews.title: good product but not great
customer_reviews.text: good product. The plastic guard doesn't work and snap into place as needed so its not as easy to use as it could be.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Williams

customer_reviews.title: Odd design
customer_reviews.text: I've had similar ones before and this ones handle is so straight it's hard to use, needs to have a slight curve to the handle to be more useful
customer_reviews.author: girloffaith

customer_reviews.title: POOR PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I never write poor reviews as a matter of principle but this is a terrible product. I purchased this for callouses and either it doesnt cut or cuts big chunks of skin out. I am a former surgical tech and used to working with blades but this product is awful. I wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING TOOL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but this is a must. This thing is the best. Especially for hard to get at callus. I have been suffering for one year with pain on one particular callus on my foot. I could never get at it. Even when I went to a foot salon and had callus removed. They never were able to remove this callus like this. NO MORE PAIN!! Thank you creator!
customer_reviews.author: myrealestate

customer_reviews.title: Save $$$ on pedicures
customer_reviews.text: I always wondered why this cost extra when you get a pedicure as it's one of the only things I want. This tool works great and will save me $$$ during the summer!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to trim my calluses that I get from Crossfit. At first I wasn't sure how it actually worked, but in the end I figured it out and I was very happy with how safe it is. It doesn't trim if there is nothing to trim, otherwise the depth is perfect to shave off the entire callus. Really smooth and easy to use. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob H

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Just don't over do it because you will cut yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Manic Pixie Dream Girl

customer_reviews.title: I had never used a razor on my callouses but I was very pleased and felt it was safe to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I had never used a razor on my callouses but I was very pleased and felt it was safe to use. It's very effective.
customer_reviews.author: ElenaS

customer_reviews.title: Slices through tough skin but you won’t bleed if you do it right😂
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Calluses on the bottom of my feet are easily shaved down.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Very, VERY sharp and removed the corns/calluses on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Very , VERY sharp and removed the corns/calluses on my hands on feet in seconds . Be very careful with the angle of your cut as I removed skin I didn't want to ( didn't hurt) From the handle to the blade , the construction seems firm , as the months go by I'll update everyone .
customer_reviews.author: Troy N. Stennett

customer_reviews.title: My feet have never looked better
customer_reviews.text: These always scare me because I'm afraid that I will shave to deep but, these don't seem to do this. I got rid of the callouses and then used the file side to smooth everything out. Then I slathered on some coconut oil and a pair of socks and the next morning my feet looked amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Wren

customer_reviews.title: Serious callous cutter
customer_reviews.text: This is a serious callous cutter. It's the only one I've found that's sharp enough and allows me to shave thin slices off my painful foot callouses. The drawback is that the design does not let you see very clearly where you are cutting, so you have to work slowly and carefully to get the hang of it. Other than that it's great. The rasp is also useful for callouses that protrude.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind

customer_reviews.title: It is by far the best way to remove callouses on the feet
customer_reviews.text: These are what the Asians use when giving pedicures. It is by far the best way to remove callouses on the feet. But beware, you can hurt yourself so be very gentle and go lightly and slowly. Really you should have someone else do this for you. Again, beware they are not legal in most salons in the USA anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Criner

customer_reviews.title: It's safe to use and works best in the shower when your foot skin is wet ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with the balls of my foots that causes callus to develop. These Callus then end up pushing against nerves and cause me much pain. Before I bought this unit I had to go to the foot doctors and have him shave them down. Tweezerman does the job I use to pay the foot doctor to do. It's safe to use and works best in the shower when your foot skin is wet and soft. I would recommend this product to anyone with similar foot problems.
customer_reviews.author: Charles D. Young

customer_reviews.title: This is a very ood piece of equipment to maintain ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very ood piece of equipment to maintain healthy feet.. I would not want to be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Filluse

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool
customer_reviews.text: Use with caution, but by all means, use this to keep your feet soft.
customer_reviews.author: TL Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product it really does work and make your heel very soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: hector gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love this callus shaver
customer_reviews.text: I used to pay extra to get the dead skin removed from my feet at the nail salon. Now I save money and my feet are always smooth because I dont have to wait until I go to the salon. Razor is sharp and product is easy to use. The grater end I hardly use, I guess it could come in handy at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This product will definitely "shave" off callus from your heels. It would be pretty difficult to really cut yourself, unless you were not really paying attention to what you are doing. The file part is a little cheap, not sturdy enough to handle rough scrubbing. You have to be careful to let the product dry completely or it will rust, don't leave it in the shower!
customer_reviews.author: 2arthurs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. I haven't needed to go to professional services to have my calluses shaved since buying this. Great little tool to have
customer_reviews.author: Czinsy

customer_reviews.title: Cover doesn’t stay put
customer_reviews.text: The buffer doesn’t stay on and the cover also move back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Elleglam

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Have used these for 10 years now and this ne of the best shavers I've come across. Really good at getting the thick stuff off quickly. Watch a YouTube or something if you're a first timer tho.
customer_reviews.author: KB Portland

customer_reviews.title: Razor not included
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my callus remover only to find there was not a blade included with the item. " very disappointed" Now I have to order the blades and wait to receive them before starting my foot treatment.
customer_reviews.author: TCee

customer_reviews.title: easily gets rid of gross calluses, don't overdo it though
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of tons of gross calluses on my heels much easier than pumice stones and sandpaper scrubber things. Don't overdo it though. While trying to shave a more sensitive callus on the side of my foot by the little toe I accidentally shaved some healthy skin off and it bled. otherwise I was quite happy with the thing
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Feet
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. I have been fighting callouses for over 20 years. I finally won. Works best for me with dry feet. I bought another with extra blades; never want to be without. By-the-way, after hundreds of dollars, I found that the best moisturizer is Vaseline Petroleum Jelly Deep Moisture Creamy Formula. Amazon has it.
customer_reviews.author: K2

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I usually leave very positive reviews on Amazon products or none at all, but I was compelled to be honest here. I have not managed to successfully use this product even once, every time I tried, it came apart in 3 pieces. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: B. F.

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done, sort of. The safety prevents effective use. It took me three times as long using this shaver as it would have with another type. The rasp is so small, I have no use for it either. Overall, my feeling about this product is, "meh"
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have watched several tutorials including the one that posted here, but sorry, it doesn’t cut anything. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. It rusted after 1 day and it does NOT work. The rasp works but the razor part does not even touch my foot where I need it to work at.
customer_reviews.author: Midnightpraise

customer_reviews.title: This will do the job
customer_reviews.text: A razor is the only thing to get rid of my heel calluses and I'm so glad I found this. I actually take the blade off and scrape my heels just like the podiatrist did. The rasp on the other end smoothens out the lines and you have a perfect heel!
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: enjoy pain free feet
customer_reviews.text: If you have calluses and corns on your feet you need this available in your medicine cabinet. Just a few minutes of work and your foot pain will vanish.
customer_reviews.author: Penny blanchard

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: unlike previous reviewer its impossiple to cut yourself.....Ive had problems forever with rouch heels...Ive tried everything including stones, files etc.... 2 days of using this and my 10 year problem is gone.....u cant cut yourself unless ur drunk!!! its safe and easy....a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not great...
customer_reviews.text: For $10 you get a product that will keep unlocking at the handle. I finally got tired of snapping it back into place, tossed it, and bought one for $5 that works better.
customer_reviews.author: barmala

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I tried it first on moistened feet
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I tried it first on moistened feet, but didn't work very well, skin clogged up the blade. Then tried it completely dry... fantastic! Was super satisfying to see the skin shaving off in thin layers.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! You must get it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the razor part, but ended up loving the rasp. I highly recommend this product to smooth out calluses or rough skin on your feet. After using less than a week, my heels were completely "healed."
customer_reviews.author: FloridaGirl

customer_reviews.title: but the emery board side is one of the best I've used
customer_reviews.text: Haven't figured out how to use the shaver yet, but the emery board side is one of the best I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Crete

customer_reviews.title: Great for calluses
customer_reviews.text: Works really great, thank goodness for a customer video review or I would not have known how to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Good at best
customer_reviews.text: Product is good at best. The main reason for the three star review is because when you use the end that has the scraper, you have to physically hold it to keep it from sliding off. It's a product flaw that needs correcting.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to get this b/c I was afraid it would hurt. But it's super easy to use, doesn't hurt at all, and very effective. It does take a couple tries to figure it out, though - long, light sweeps work better than going slow and deep. It's also a really great price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: celticmommie

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t remove anything.
customer_reviews.text: This was very ineffective. It was very difficult to get it to remove anything. The safety piece on it prevents you from being able to do anything. Was also very low quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony K Maness II

customer_reviews.title: amazing tool
customer_reviews.text: I have very calloused heels and over th last 20 years have spent a lot of money on podiatrists, professional pedicures, and products designed to address the problem. This product is terrific, and did as good a job as the best pedicure I've had which I paid $55. for. Doesn't come with any instructions and I had a hard time figuring out how to use the product. I had to read back over some reviews to find out that I should pop out the tiny white plastic piece first! Now i need advice on how to change the blade.......
customer_reviews.author: mirrten

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I've had multiple surgeries on my foot and calluses build up quick. This product is quick and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi F.

customer_reviews.title: Great cure for cracking skin
customer_reviews.text: Wish I knew about this product before. Wear flip flops all the time and it beats up my feet to where they crack. Used this after the shower a couple times and my feet are back to normal. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Grimmy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but be careful, it is really sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Bromelain

customer_reviews.title: Shaver ... My ass
customer_reviews.text: They call this thing eight callus shaver in the description . This thing is a joke . There isn't an image anywhere on this thing to shave with . How the f*** do you call this piece of garbage a callus shaver when there is no sharp edge anywhere on the product .
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste money on this
customer_reviews.text: Does not remove the dead skin at all. I usually love all tweezerman product’s but this was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: jaimie h.

customer_reviews.title: No More Rough Heels
customer_reviews.text: This handy little tool is just what I've been looking for to keep my heels smooth. Don't know why nobody carries them in-store though, so I had to buy online.
customer_reviews.author: Reader&Viewer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Biggest waist of money. The blade part kept coming apart. The whole device was just very cheaply made. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great! I feel 2" shorter now, and my feet are as smooth as a baby's bottom. If you are troubled by rough, calloused feet, buy one of these and get busy. You'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Does a Great Job
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my feet looking great. It's seems very safe, I have never cut myself and I just ordered more blades. The original blade is still fine, but I want to be ready when I need a new one.
customer_reviews.author: cleejazzd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't scrape too many successive times over one spot or you'll get down to live tissue! Otherwise, very effective.
customer_reviews.author: CDoy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing that something so simple works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I found this. Works better than anything else out there. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: hunnybunny17

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after one use -_-
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's just the way I used it or what but this thing fell apart after I used it once, on one foot! I'll stick to the professionals at my nail salon lol.
customer_reviews.author: I Am Her

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Took me a minute to realize how it works, but then, callus gone!
customer_reviews.author: Steve McMillan

customer_reviews.title: tweezerman callous shaver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Tweezerman callous shaver after purchasing another brand that didn't work well. This shaver stands up to the usual great quality of all the Tweezerman products I have tried in the past. It really works great!
customer_reviews.author: A. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This works well once I figured out how to take the blade protector off.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M.

customer_reviews.title: Tweezerman callus shaver
customer_reviews.text: What hard skin? None on feet when you use Tweezerman. Great products. Purchased extra blades in case I couldn't find them again. Used to buy these products in a store that closed.
customer_reviews.author: blddybrit

customer_reviews.title: Feels like it either doesn't go deep enough or sometimes too ...
customer_reviews.text: Expecting it to do more. Feels like it either doesn't go deep enough or sometimes too deep. Not as good as nail salon ones.
customer_reviews.author: ToastyEwok

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Have used one for years, be careful, very sharp as it is a razor.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon for another great purchase with free shipping!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal and works really well. I would highly recommend this product to anyone who want's a great deal at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: KMJ

customer_reviews.title: This is the best thing ever for dry skin on your heels/feet
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever for dry skin on your heels/feet. Woah. Mind was blown. Better than a pedicure. Only you don't get the massage ;)
customer_reviews.author: Angellea T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, great price. The pedicure razor is exactly as described. It works great and I highly recommend it for in between pedicures.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Smoothes out your feet
customer_reviews.text: Best way to keep your feet feeling smooth between pedi's
customer_reviews.author: TRISHA

customer_reviews.title: More aggressive than pumice
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Compared to something like a pumice stone this is a much more aggressive way to remove calluses and keep them under control. That's both good and bad... with a pumice stone I need to use it nearly every day but I haven't had a problem with going too far into healthy skin using a stone. This callus shaver doesn't need to be used every day but it can get into healthy skin if you're not careful and that makes for a few uncomfortable few days while it heals. I bought for use on my hands and it works well. Also great for use on heels. Recommendation: be careful with how much you take off at a time.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Tweezerman Safety Slide Callus Shaver with Rasp
customer_reviews.text: Great! I love it! I've said all I need to say about the product. I'd recommend it. I do not have anymore to say about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product but be Careful!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome - it works really well but you can easily remove too much skin if not careful!
customer_reviews.author: P. Moffett

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: It really works. Removed painful calluses. Has a safety cover for the razor. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: KinaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Check the blade that is in this shaver before you use it
customer_reviews.text: While I was following a video about how to insert the blade, the blade that came with shaver fell out. It looked very dirty - as did the inside of the shaver where the razor is positioned. So I discarded the dirty razor and carefully washed the shaver, rinsed with hot water and soaked in alcohol. Then I inserted a fresh blade. I gave this product an okay rating because I am just learning to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Costello

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, come apart as you are using it. Do not waste your money. Total crap.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: CUTEM OFF
customer_reviews.text: I'VE USED IT SEVERAL TIMES AND IT SEEMS TO DO THE JOB WELL. NO CUTS AS OF YET.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pray

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst item! Even after watching 'how to' YouTube videos, I could not get it to work. Trust me, don't waste your money. I ended up just throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this product is comparable to others of the same type... It just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Better solution than electric callus removers.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. I didn't have any problem adjusting the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Amezcua

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I used this twice in the shower, both the shaver and the rasp, and my feet feel like velvet! Just be careful to dry thoroughly if you use in the shower or tub - I even blowdry inside as much as I can, otherwise it might rust. But it is a good quality item and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, fast shipping,high quality, easy to use and easy to change the blade, I love this product
customer_reviews.author: Elena Craciun

customer_reviews.title: Not their best item.
customer_reviews.text: The rasp kept coming off, and the unit had a cheap feel to it. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: James Kamerer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product itself worked well but rusted several hours after use even after drying it with a towel.
customer_reviews.author: Csmith

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would be good because of the brand name
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm using it wrong but I can't get it to scrape anything off
customer_reviews.author: ARLady

customer_reviews.title: Was dissappointed,
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the one I owned before, and lost the little piece that holds the blade in place.. Blades did not seem to be to sharp..
customer_reviews.author: MARGE CROWDER

customer_reviews.title: It is hard to oversell how satisfying this is
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Nothing fancy just a razor blade to your calloused feet but it is so great. I have feet that resemble normal human feet after years of wearing flats with no socks. I used to have deep heel cracks and was super ashamed to show anyone. Truly miraculous.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Hawes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This didn't come with the razor like it advertised - so upset
customer_reviews.author: Estee

customer_reviews.title: It does the job, but be careful
customer_reviews.text: It does remove dead skin, but use it cautiously. My husband started going at it a little fast and ended up bleeding.
customer_reviews.author: Amamel

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter who chose this exact item because it was used on her at a nice salon. She is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let Down
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product with high hopes. With the way that they described it in the description, I thought that the blade would indefinitely save my rough, calloused heels from the then current state of them. Unfortunately, the blade was dull and poorly fastened in the shaver itself. After one swipe, it grazed over the dead skin and hardly skinned a layer off. Never purchasing again. I've found better lotions/treatments for less.
customer_reviews.author: Paris C

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Callus!
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out how to expose the darn blade, we were off to the races! That uncomfortable corn/callus on the bottom of my foot pad was no match for this little gem. I get regular pedicures every 3 weeks but wanted this utensil for shaving down the corn/callus more. I suppose the 'pros' worry they might hurt you. This did not hurt at all and was easy to use. I may now have to go after my husbands gnarly corns/calluses with this tool. Wish it came with extra blades, but I can get those cheap enough at the drug store.
customer_reviews.author: T-Money

customer_reviews.title: Probably works, hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I had a really hard time using this product. It kinda works but i bought it to remove hand calluses from working out and it was definitely not much helpful. Need easier way to use it or come with instructions. Had a hard time replacing blade as well. Actually broke the blade while doing it and threw this away.
customer_reviews.author: analysisguy

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Flimsier than a previous shaver I had, but generally does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Be-Be

customer_reviews.title: Does the job where it can maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Works well but it's hard to get into certain spots on your hands
customer_reviews.author: BPaula

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My feet build up pretty rough/painfull calluses and this thing shaves them down quickly and painlessly. Makes life so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: The space where the blade goes on the shaver end ...
customer_reviews.text: The space where the blade goes on the shaver end is just too narrow of an opening. All I can do is rub it on my foot, it doesn't shave anything off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this thing a lot. Still need to be tested more but it is very promising thus far.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works wonderfully for hand or foot calluses. I am so tired to my hands ripping while lifting weights/doing pull-ups and I think this will be the difference. My calluses have been shaved down effectively and I will be testing them out today. Foot calluses are also taken care of. The rasp end helps file down uneven edges to give a nice smooth path of skin. I like this thing a lot. Still need to be tested more but it is very promising thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Milani

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about whether this would work after trying the pedegg which didn't work at all. While the file on this doesn't do much the shaver works great at removing dead skin. The first think I have tried that works. Highly recommend for that use.
customer_reviews.author: ghostshot

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I decided to try it. Well, it does a good job but I was worried at first that it could take too much off. With practice and a light hand, it works great. I tried the pedegg but it never did enough for the edges of the heals that go bad with age.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Wandel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product may have to repurchase soon mine got lost in the move
customer_reviews.author: Tanisha L. G

product_meta.title: Tweezerman Safety Slide Callus Shaver/Rasp Model No. 5055-R
product_meta.description: At-home pedicure essential, the safety slide callus shaver & rasp, removes calluses and smooths rough, dry feet.
